# Compare magrittr and native pipe 


# first, use magrittr, more features
x %>% f(y) is f(x,y)
y %>% f(x, .) is f(x,y) same
```r
library(magrittr)

# define function of two variables:
f  <- function(x,y) x + 2*y

f(1,10)   # 21

# both pipes work fine for first position of f `x`

1 |>  f(10)    # 21
1 %>% f(10)    # 21


# but only magrittr works for 2nd position, `y`


10 |> f(1, .)   # error, `unused argument (.)
10 %>% f(1, .)  # 21


#x %>% f(y)

1 %>% f(10)   # 21,  ie f(x, y) f(1,10)


10 %>% f(1, .) # 21  ie f(x,y) f(1,10)

```

# But native pipe, only 1st way
```r
1 |> f(10)   #21

#error, fails
10 |> f(1, .)

```
